Hi Alan -- Would that be the same as Owari Ikko-do?  There is a tsuba 
on T=
okugawa (tsuba page one bottom) which has that same look and goes 
by that =
description.  I had not heard that term before.
Hope all is well.
Pete Klei=
n

ari kinko, it has a feeling of

uba is nice. The nanako is very good and

e the thickness of the piece and the

oundedness to it so
